 2017-08222017-06-20,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of absence to the Hon. Edwin B. Minden
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. EDWIN B. MINDEN, a judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, from March 2, 2017 to September 2, 2017, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
